transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello, a very good afternoon sir. Meri baat Vaishnavi sorting machine se ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Sir, main Kavita baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Sir, aapka kya concern hai? Aapne jo hai ticket open kiya hua hai, matlab complaint raise ki hui hai aapne abhi?
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho mam?
Executive: Sir, aapne jo hai complaint raise ki hui hai, matlab aapne jaise ki main check kar rahi thi, aapne complaint raise ki hai. Sir, kya issue aa raha hai matlab aap logo ko concern bataiye.
Customer: Aapki taraf se koi concern nahi hai. Main ye kya hai hum, hum logo na usme images vagera upload nahi kar pa rahe. Hamare paas pura data hi nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Aapko jo hai usme product vagera add karne hai sir?
Customer: Haan, wo sab karne hai mam aur wo kya hai ki hum log pura proper data nahi hai. Agar aapka aadmi visit kar le hamare yaha pe website ya fir man lo ki photo vagera upload kar de ya waha pe us hisab se kar de to ho jayega.
Executive: Sir, aisa possible hai kya? Dekhiye sir, aapki jo profile hai na abhi head office mein hai. To hum na yaha se aapko phone ke through aur video meet ke through jo hai guide kar sakte hai. To aisa possible hai ki main aapko Google Meet share karu. Aap mere ko share kar dijiyega, main product vagera add kar dungi over the call. Bataiye.
Customer: Uske liye data kya kya chahiye mam aapko? Wo hume prepare karna padega aapko dene ke liye. Dekho photos jo hai jitne hai wo already humne upload kar chuke hai hum log ji.
Executive: Yes sir. Sir, jaise ki main check kar rahi thi na sir, aapke jo hai 17 products add hai. Theek hai? Usme teen mein price add nahi hai aur ek mein photo vagera add nahi hai. Aapko in 17 products ke alawa aur bhi product add karne hai jaise ki aapne bataya, right?
Customer: Nahi nahi mam, hamara sirf color sorter ka kaam hai. Color sorter machine hai hamari. Usme khali model number hai na jaise mam, usme model hai usme alag alag.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Five shoot, six shoot, seven shoot, usme kuch hamare paas images nahi hai jaise 12 shoot ki nahi hai shayad. Aur koi aise aise koi ek shoot ki nahi hai shayad.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To usme kya kya miss ho raha hai aapki taraf se matlab hum aapko kya data de mam jisse wo complete ho jaye profile. Aapko kya kya miss lag raha hai usme? Wo confirm nahi ho raha hai ji hume acche se.
Executive: Okay. Sir, abhi aapke liye possible hai ki aap Google Meet ke through join kar le? Nahi na ek baar aapki jo hai aapko dikha dete hu main. Okay, abhi possible hai?
Customer: Mam, ek kaam kijiye, aap na ek number likhiye. Wo Poonam madam baithi hai abhi. Aap unko ek baar pura samjha dijiye ki kaise karna hai ji. Aap unka number likh lijiye.
Executive: Ji, okay mam, number bata dijiye. Ji. Ji.
Customer: Likhiye mam, 9929
Executive: 9929
Customer: 2970
Executive: 70
Customer: 900
Executive: 900. Main repeat karti hu sir, 992970900, right?
Customer: Ji mam, ji mam. Aap inse mam ek baar pura ek baar coordinate karwa dijiye hume aur ye madam aapko matlab jo bhi chahiye aapko ye fulfill karke isko complete kar denge ji task ko.
Executive: Ji, okay sir. Aur sir jo aapka abhi yaha pe jo hai click complaint raise tha wo main close kar du yaha se? Aap bataiye.
Customer: Ji, ye ek baar Poonam madam se baat kar lijiye mam aur unko hi bata dijiye ki kya kya chahiye aapko matlab.
Executive: Okay. Okay sir, koi issue nahi hai. Unse hi kar lijiye, wo us profile ko complete kar denge mam. Wo hi dekh rahi hai iska sara kaam jaise.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Sir, aap owner hai company ke?
Customer: Haan, main hi dekh raha hu mam is company ko. Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Okay. Okay sir, ek cheez mere ko aur confirm karni thi to jo buyleads vagera sab jo connect karne ka rehta hai like jo buyers vagera se connect kaun karta hai? Aap karte hai ya Poonam mam karti hai?
Customer: Usme do karte hai ji hum log. Main aur Gautam Rana hai ek wo usko karte hai mam. Hum log connect karte hai. Okay, to sir abhi buyleads vagera a rahi thi unka kya feedback tha? To sir usi ke according main changes karungi.
Customer: Mam aa rahi hai wo mam hume bhej bhi rahi hai. Ek baar Poonam mam se coordinate karke mam ye profile pura complete ho jaye na ji 100% to hume lagta hai ki wo plus milega hume. Abhi hamari taraf se hi kuch fault hai ye to.
Executive: Okay sir, no issue. Main ek baar jo hai Poonam mam se connect kar leti hu. Haan, unse connect kar dijiye aur unhone query raise ki hai.
Customer: Haan, haan available hai wo office pe hi hai mam.
Executive: Sorry sir, abhi aapne kya kaha? Accha unhone unhi ne jo hai query raise kari.
Customer: Haan, haan unhone hi query raise kari.
Executive: Okay, okay. Okay, okay no issue sir, ek baar main unse connect kar leti hu.
Customer: Theek hai mam. Okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to upload images, data incomplete.

- Needs assistance with profile completion.

- Wants someone to visit for photo uploads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered guidance via phone/video meet.

- Customer provided Poonam's number for assistance.

- Executive agreed to contact Poonam for profile completion.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with Poonam.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, images, data, products, poonam
